title: 256.028 TAX REBATES.
text: Any federal or state tax rebate received by a recipient of a public assistance program shall not be counted as income or as an asset for purposes of any of the public assistance programs under this chapter or any other chapter, including, but not limited to, chapter 142G, 256B, 256D, 256E, 256I, or 256L to the extent permitted under federal law.
